hanzi-su-wiki:
蔭

Значения

Тень

Мнемоника

Тень 陰 травы 艹. Считалось, что через тень можно влиять на человека. Наступать на тень учителя — невежливо.

Варианты

荫

yìn
shade
оттенок
rtega_mnemonic:
蔭蔭RS
荫荫		䅧䕃廕窨𦺼shade, shelter, protect, with the support of
  • in the shadow of the slope 陰 or the vegetation 艹: shade protects from the sun
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 荫)
Ideographic: Shade 陰 provided by a tree 艹; 陰 also provides the pronunciation
purpleculture_examples:
蔭涼 [ yìn liáng ]: shady and cool
蔭蔽 [ yìn bì ]: to be shaded or concealed by foliage; to conceal; hidden; covert; shade (of a tree)
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿱ Above to below
    • 艹 [ cǎo ] grass, weed, plant, herb
    • 陰 [ yīn ] the female principle; dark, shaded; hidden, implicit, secret
heisig_chinese_memo: To maintain yin yang (balance) flowers must have some sun, but they also must have some shady.
Ru_Notes: Фонетик и по сути аналог: 陰 (かげ、イン тень). У 蔭 есть доп. употребление "благодаря чему-л." (<ruby>お蔭<rt>おかげ</rt></ruby>), у 陰 — "лунное (женское) начало, инь" (<ruby>陰<rt>いん</rt></ruby>).
Ru_Words:
蔭かげ
  • тень
  • теневая сторона, обратная сторона
    • お蔭おかげ
  • благодаря кому-чему-л., с чьей-л. помощью, из-за
  • помощь, поддержка
    • 日蔭ひかげ
  • тень
    • warodai
    日蔭者ひかげもの
  • живущий в тени (в безвестности, уединённо)
  • отверженный (о человеке, имеющем судимость, о незаконнорождённом, о содержанке)
    • warodai
    蔭乗りかげのり
  • разг. закулисные действия
    • warodai
    樹蔭こかげ
    緑蔭りょくいん
  • тень дерева (деревьев)
    • warodai
Ru_Radicals: 一 (один), 二 (два), 个 (китайский счётный суффикс), 厶 (значок МУ), 艾 (мокса), 阡 (межа с севера на юг)
Ru_trainchinese:
yīn: (сущ) тень дерева
yìn: (прил/глаг) сырой и холодный; (о деревьях) укрывать; (об императоре) воздавать почести потомкам за заслуги их отцов
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the shadow (陰) of the grass (艹) = a shadow
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: The pinnacle has the perfect amount of shady (yin) for flowers to grow.  Not too much not too little.
humanum_full_description_en:
From "艸", " Yin " sound. The original meaning is shade. "Said the text": "Yin, chai Yin. From the cha, Yin sound." Such as "Xunzi. "Encourage Learning": "The woods are luxuriant and the axe is so heavy, the trees are shaded and the birds are resting." "Xijing Miscellaneous Notes. Third": "There are five tussah trees in the Wuzha Palace, all of which are in three arms, and the upper branches cover dozens of acres."

" Yin " connects with " Yin ", which means shadow. Such as "Zuo Zhuan. "The First Year of Zhao Gong": "Zhao Meng looked at Yin and said: "Who can wait for five if day and night are not together?"" Du's note: "Yin, day scene." "Wen Xuan. Lu Shiheng "Yan Lianzhu": "The ministers are very good at music and do not admire the joy of Juntian; they are in the shade, and there is no false cloud hanging down from the sky."

" Shadow " means covering up. Such as "The Songs of the Chu. Nine songs. "Mountain Ghost": "The people in the mountains are fragrant with Du Ruo, and the stone springs are shaded with pine and cypresses." One of the Eastern Jin Dynasty Tao Yuanming's "Guiyuan Tianju": "Yu Liu Yin Hou Garden, Tao Li Luo Tang."

" Yin " means shelter. For example, Cao Jie of the Three Kingdoms "On the Six Dynasties": "The branches and leaves of the state of the official clan, but the roots have no shelter when the branches and leaves fall." "Southern Qi Shu. "Wang Sengqian Biography": "The situation I can't be for Ru Yin, the political should work hard."

" Yin " means shelter, which means that descendants of the feudal era were rewarded for their merits or merits. Such as "Wei Shu. "Zhang Yi Biography": "Through a young talent, borrowing shade to become an official, learning specialization, Wuque strategy, the grace of the early Dutch emperor's family, the end of the majesty of Meng." "New Tang Book. "Election History": "Great-grandson of Grade 3 or higher, Yin grandson of Grade 5 or higher."
humanum_short_description_en: From "艸", " Yin " sound. The original meaning is shade.
humanum_full_description:
從「艸」，「陰」聲。本義是樹蔭。《說文》：「蔭，艸陰地。从艸，陰聲。」如《荀子．勸學》：「林木茂而斧斤至焉，樹成蔭而眾鳥息焉。」《西京雜記．第三》：「五柞宮有五柞樹，皆連三抱，上枝蔭覆數十畝。」

　　「蔭」通「陰」，表示陰影。如《左傳．昭公元年》：「趙孟視蔭曰：『朝夕不相及，誰能待五？』」杜預注：「蔭，日景也。」《文選．陸士衡〈演連珠〉》：「臣聞聽極於音，不慕鈞天之樂；身足於蔭，無假垂天之雲。」

　　「蔭」引申表示遮蓋。如《楚辭．九歌．山鬼》：「山中人兮芳杜若，飲石泉兮蔭松柏。」 東晉陶淵明〈歸園田居〉之一：「榆柳蔭後園，桃李羅堂前。」

　　「蔭」表示庇護。如三國魏曹冏〈六代論〉：「臣聞公族者國之枝葉，枝葉落則本根無所庇蔭。」《南齊書．王僧虔傳》：「況吾不能為汝蔭，政應各自努力耳。」

　　「蔭」表示庇蔭，指封建時代子孫因先代官爵或功勛而受到封賞。如《魏書．張彝傳》：「過以小才，藉蔭出仕，學慚專門，武闕方略，早荷先帝眷仗之恩，末蒙陛下不遺之施。」《新唐書．選舉志》：「三品以上蔭曾孫，五品以上蔭孫。」

  • in the shadow of the slope 陰 or the vegetation 艹: shade protects from the sun
(Simplified: 荫)
Chinese Definition:
Ideographic: Shade 陰 provided by a tree 艹; 陰 also provides the pronunciation
  • ⿱ Above to below
    • 艹 [ cǎo ] grass, weed, plant, herb
    • 陰 [ yīn ] the female principle; dark, shaded; hidden, implicit, secret
①庇廕。封建時代，因祖先有勳勞或官職而循例受封、得官。［合］蔭恤(因前代功德而得到官職或撫卹)；蔭籍(依賴先輩有功而得到恩賜的官職)；廕生(因先世蔭庇而入國子監讀書的稱爲廕生)。
蔭涼 [ yìn liáng ]: shady and cool
蔭蔽 [ yìn bì ]: to be shaded or concealed by foliage; to conceal; hidden; covert; shade (of a tree)
(Simplified: 荫)
Chinese Definition:
Ideographic: Shade 陰 provided by a tree 艹; 陰 also provides the pronunciation
Kanshudo mnemonic:the shadow (陰) of the grass (艹) = a shadow
Chinese: To maintain yin yang (balance) flowers must have some sun, but they also must have some shady.  
Meaning: shady
Hanzi: 荫
Story: The pinnacle has the perfect amount of shady (yin) for flowers to grow. Not too much not too little.
Kind: traditional

從「 艸 」，「 陰 」聲。本義是樹蔭。《說文》：「蔭，艸陰地。从艸，陰聲。」如《荀子．勸學》：「林木茂而斧斤至焉，樹成蔭而眾鳥息焉。」《西京雜記．第三》：「五柞宮有五柞樹，皆連三抱，上枝蔭覆數十畝。」 「 蔭 」通「 陰 」，表示陰影。如《左傳．昭公元年》：「趙孟視蔭曰：『朝夕不相及，誰能待五？』」杜預注：「蔭，日景也。」《文選．陸士衡〈演連珠〉》：「臣聞聽極於音，不慕鈞天之樂；身足於蔭，無假垂天之雲。」 「 蔭 」引申表示遮蓋。如《楚辭．九歌．山鬼》：「山中人兮芳杜若，飲石泉兮蔭松柏。」 東晉陶淵明〈歸園田居〉之一：「榆柳蔭後園，桃李羅堂前。」 「 蔭 」表示庇護。如三國魏曹冏〈六代論〉：「臣聞公族者國之枝葉，枝葉落則本根無所庇蔭。」《南齊書．王僧虔傳》：「況吾不能為汝蔭，政應各自努力耳。」 「 蔭 」表示庇蔭，指封建時代子孫因先代官爵或功勛而受到封賞。如《魏書．張彝傳》：「過以小才，藉蔭出仕，學慚專門，武闕方略，早荷先帝眷仗之恩，末蒙陛下不遺之施。」《新唐書．選舉志》：「三品以上蔭曾孫，五品以上蔭孫。」
From " 艸", " Yin" sound. The original meaning is shade. "Said the text": "Yin, chai Yin. From the cha, Yin sound." Such as "Xunzi. Lu Shiheng "Yan Lianzhu": "The ministers are very good at music and do not admire the joy of Juntian; they are in the shade, and there is no false cloud hanging down from the sky." 蔭字的基本解释

蔭
yīn

蔭字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yīn］
［《集韻》於金切，平侵，影。］
亦作“廕1”。“荫1”的繁体字。
(1)树荫。
(2)日影。
[②]［yìn］［yīn］
［《廣韻》於禁切，去沁，影。］
“荫2”的繁体字。“陰2”的被通假字。
(1)没有阳光；又凉又潮。参见“蔭2凉”。
(2)遮盖；隐蔽。
(3)庇荫。封建时代子孙因先世有功劳而得到封赏或免罪。
(4)指地窖或暗室。

蔭字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　蔭； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页1055第26
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】?於禁切，音廕。【說文】草隂地。【徐曰】草所庇也。【荀子·勸學篇】樹成蔭而衆鳥息焉。【呂氏春秋】松柏成而塗之人已蔭矣。　又日景也。【左傳·昭元年】趙孟視蔭。　又通廕。【左傳·文九年】本根無所庇廕。　又【韻會】通作隂。【詩·大雅】旣之隂女。　又【左傳·文十七年】鹿死不擇音。【註】音同蔭。【杜云】所茠蔭之處。古字借用。　又【集韻】於金切，音隂。草木蔭翳也。【班固·西都賦】茂樹蔭蔚。　或作?。

蔭字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
蔭字的起名意思

暂无。

shade
Basic explanation of words
shade
yīn
shade
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yīn］
["Jiyun" Yu Jinqie, flat invasion, shadow. ]
Also known as "Yum 1". Traditional characters for "阴1".
(1) Shade.
(2) Sun shadow.
[②]［yìn］［yīn］
["Guangyun" in Jinqie, go to Qin, shadow. ]
Traditional characters for "阴2". "Yin 2" was passed falsely.
(1) There is no sunlight; it is cool and damp. See "Shadow 2 Cool".
(2) Cover; conceal.
(3) Shade. In the feudal era, descendants were rewarded or exonerated because of the merits of their ancestors.
(4) Refers to cellars or darkrooms.
shade
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Ji 1] [Department of Jian Zi] 　 Yin; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Page 1055 26
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting]? Yu ban cut, Yin Yin. [Said the text] Grass shade. [Xu Yue] She is sheltered by grass. 【Xunzi·Encouraging Learning】The trees are in shade and the birds are resting. [Lu Shi Chunqiu] The pine and cypress are grown and the people who are painted have been shaded.　It's also day scene. [Zuo Zhuan·Zhaoyuan Year] Zhao Meng Shiyin.　Tong Yin again. [Zuo Zhuan·Wen Jiu Nian] Bengen has no shelter.　[Rhyme Club] Tong Zuo Yin. 【Poetry·Daya】The yin girl of 旣.　[Zuo Zhuan·Wen Seventeen Years] The deer died without choosing the sound. [Note] The sound is the same as Yin. [Du Yun] The place where the shade is. Borrowing ancient characters.　[Jiyun] Yu Jinqie, Yin Yin. Vegetation shade also. 【Banggu·Xidufu】Mao Shu Yinwei.　Or make?.
